summary: This document appears to be a deposit account opening application from Deutsche Bank, detailing customer identification policies and requirements for establishing a business relationship with the bank. It emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations and the need for clients to provide accurate information regarding their identities and financial activities.
keyFacts: The document outlines the customer identification policy required by federal law for financial institutions.
It mentions the obligation of clients to provide accurate information and notify the bank of any changes.
There are references to anti-money laundering requirements that necessitate active involvement from both the bank and its clients.
